section.title: The abbr element
section.p: The abbr element represents an abbreviation or acronym.

item.title: Children
item.pml:code: ( em | metadata | object | quote | span | sub | sup | text() )+

item.title: Parents
item.pml:code: ( cell | citation | em | example | item | metadata | note | object | p | quote | span | sub | summary | sup | title )

section.p: The content attribute may be used to provide an expansion of the abbreviation.
The about attribute may be used to provide a resource which contains the expanded form.
content and about attributes are mutually exclusive.
